title: Hot Tech Stocks for 2020, Businessweek at 90: Covering Business Through the Decades
itunes:title: Hot Tech Stocks for 2020, Businessweek at 90: Covering Business Through the Decades
description:
Bloomberg Intelligence Senior Investment Bank Analyst Alison Williams discusses a hedge fund purge as $3 trillion market retrenches. John Freeman, Vice President of Equity Research at CFRA, talks about hot tech stocks for 2020. Bloomberg News U.S. Autos Team Leader Craig Trudell shares his insight on Tesla delivering its first China-built cars. Bloomberg Businessweek Economics Editor Peter Coy walks through Businessweek at 90: Covering Business Through the Decades. And we Drive to the Close with Randy Watts, Chief Investment Strategist at William O'Neil + Co.

Hosts: Jason Kelly and Taylor Riggs. Producer: Doni Holloway. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
